title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.10 - Recommendation for removal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.10 - Recommendation for removal

State Regulations

An advisory committee may, at any
time, recommend to the Presiding Justice that an attorney be removed from the
panel. Such recommendation shall be submitted in writing, together with a
report of the basis for such recommendation. Such recommendation shall not be
required where an attorney is not reappointed at the expiration of his or her
term. The Presiding Justice shall have the power to remove members of the

Family Court attorneys for children panels and members of panels established
for attorneys assigned pursuant to Family Court Act, section
262. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
679.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
